snippet: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. The board of directors, advisory board and staff of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation mourn the passing of Barbara Goldsmith, brilliant author, treasured friend and BCRF advisory board member. We send heartfelt condolences ...
lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. The board of directors, advisory board and staff of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation mourn the passing of Barbara Goldsmith, brilliant author, treasured friend and BCRF advisory board member. We send heartfelt condolences to the entire Goldsmith family. Leonard A. Lauder, Honorary Chairman; Kinga Lampert, Co-Chairman; William Lauder, Co-Chairman; Larry Norton, M.D., Scientific Director; Myra J. Biblowit, President 1/3
